entities.description: Youth respondents in the NSDUH survey.
Major Depressive Episode with Severe Impairment
Past Year Illicit Drug Use with Alcohol Use Combination

relationships.description: Indicates the presence of a Major Depressive Episode among youth respondents.
Indicates that the Major Depressive Episode is accompanied by severe impairment.
Indicates that the Major Depressive Episode with severe impairment includes alcohol use.
Indicates that the Major Depressive Episode with severe impairment includes past year illicit drug use with alcohol use combination.
Indicates that the Major Depressive Episode with severe impairment includes any illicit drug use disorder.
Indicates that the Major Depressive Episode with severe impairment includes illicit drug use disorder.
Indicates that the Major Depressive Episode with severe impairment includes substance use disorder.

tables.description: Major Depressive Episode with Severe Impairment includes Any Illicit Drug Use Disorder.

tables.subject: MDEImpairment
tables.description: Major Depressive Episode with Severe Impairment includes Illicit Drug Use Disorder.

tables.subject: MDEImpairment
tables.description: Major Depressive Episode with Severe Impairment includes Substance Use Disorder.
